Text:
What negative thing could I possibly say about these?
Oh yes.. the price.

It costs over a dollar a bar to get a fix of this legal crack.
They are that delicious (at least this flavor, the cherry dark chocolate and the peanut dark chocolate.. I was not to fond of the super nutty one - but to each their own)
These in particular have an addictive quality which hurts my bank account.
you shouldn't be eating more than one of them in a day though, so it's honestly not that bad of a deal.
They just taste so darn good.
